meanings.definition: An educational talk or speech given to a group of people.
meanings.sent1: During the lectures, the professor explained the topic in detail.
meanings.sent2: I attended three lectures on history last week.
meanings.sent3: The lectures were so boring that some students fell asleep.
meanings.sent4: Her lectures were like a guiding light for the confused students.
meanings.sent5: The lectures echoed through the hall, leaving a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: To give a talk or speech to a group of people.
meanings.sent1: She lectures on biology every Monday morning.
meanings.sent2: He lectures at the university on economics.
meanings.sent3: The cat lectures the kittens on the art of hunting.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl lectures the young birds on the ways of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The coach lectures the team on the importance of teamwork before every game.
